nl.inl.blacklab.search.results

Interface ResultGroups<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - result type, e.g. Hit for groups of hits
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DocGroups, DocResults, HitGroups

    public interface ResultGroups<T>
    Grouped results of some type

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default AnnotatedField field()
      Get field our results came from.
      Group<T> get(int i) 
      Group<T> get(PropertyValue prop) 
      Map<PropertyValue,? extends Group<T>> getGroupMap() 
      ResultProperty<T> groupCriteria()
      What were these results grouped on?
      default BlackLabIndex index()
      Get index our results came from.
      int largestGroupSize()
      Return the size of the largest group
      QueryInfo queryInfo()
      Get our original query info.
      int size()
      Return the number of groups
      int sumOfGroupSizes()
      Get the total number of results that were grouped
      ResultGroups<T> withFewerStoredResults(int maximumNumberOfResultsPerGroup)
      Get an instance of this grouping with fewer stored results per group.

    • Method Detail

      • index

        default BlackLabIndex index()
        Get index our results came from.
        Returns:
        index

      • field

        default AnnotatedField field()
        Get field our results came from. If this is a set of document results that didn't come from a set of hits, this will return null.
        Returns:
        field, or null if none

      • get

        Group<T> get(PropertyValue prop)

      • get

        Group<T> get(int i)

      • withFewerStoredResults

        ResultGroups<T> withFewerStoredResults(int maximumNumberOfResultsPerGroup)
        Get an instance of this grouping with fewer stored results per group. This won't affect the group sizes, just the number of results that are stored per group.
        Parameters:
        maximumNumberOfResultsPerGroup - maximum number of results to store, or -1 for the same
        Returns:
        new grouping with fewer stored results

      • getGroupMap

        Map<PropertyValue,? extends Group<T>> getGroupMap()
